description: After Afghanistan's spy agency allegedly "detained and tortured" two Pakistan embassy staffers, Islamabad - which India has accused of violating a 1961 convention of diplomatic relations in the Kulbhushan Jadhav case - accused Afghanistan of violating the Vienna Convention.
title: At receiving end after diplomats 'detained', Pakistan now accuses Kabul of violating Vienna Convention - Times of India

author: Vidya Ram
description: At urgent ICJ hearing, Pakistan says Vienna Convention provisions were not intended for spies
title: Kulbhushan Jadhav’s trial farcical, says India at ICJ

author: Samuel Osborne
description: Theresa May has said the UK will remain signatories to the European Convention of Human Rights for the next Parliament. The Prime Minister was reportedly planning to make the case to leave the ECHR a central aspect of her 2020 election campaign before she called for an early election.
title: Theresa May announces UK will remain part of European Convention of Human Rights

author: Al Jazeera
description: Kremlin offer comes amid row over US president's disclosure of ISIL-related information to top Russian diplomats.
title: Putin offers to share Trump-Lavrov meeting transcript

author: Al Jazeera
description: Report blaming US president for leaking ISIL-related intelligence to Russian diplomats stirs up a new political storm.
title: Donald Trump defends sharing 'facts' with Russia

author: http://www.abc.net.au/news/nour-haydar/8323942, http://www.abc.net.au/news/riley-stuart/8151366
description: One of Australia's most senior tax officials is charged in relation to a major fraud investigation that allegedly involved $165 million being stolen from the Commonwealth.
title: ATO deputy commissioner charged in relation to son's alleged $165m fraud

author: By Joseph Curtis For Mailonline
description: Redbridge Council in East London heard a report has found 19 per cent of child deaths in the borough between 2008 and 2016 were directly due to the parents being related.
title: East London borough child deaths due to related parents

author: May Bulman
description: One in five child deaths in an east London borough have occurred because the mother and father are related, a report has found. Redbridge Council found deaths of children from parents who were known consanguineous couples – meaning second cousins or more closely related – accounted for 19 per cent of 124 cases reviewed in the borough between 2008 and 2016.
title: One in five child deaths caused by parents being related in London borough

author: Jay Solomon
description: Arab Gulf states have offered to take concrete steps to establish better relations with Israel if Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu will make a significant overture aimed at restarting the Middle East peace process, according to people briefed on the discussions.
title: Gulf States Offer Better Relations If Israel Makes New Bid for Peace

description: The Syrian regime burned the bodies of “thousands” of prisoners in a giant crematorium at its most notorious jail in an effort to hide the scale of its killings, the top US diplomat for the Middle East revealed Monday.
title: Syrian regime burned bodies of 'thousands' of prisoners at crematorium to hide scale of slaughter, US diplomat reveals
